author: Kan Ting Chiu J:
casename: Mohd Raffiq Bin Mohd Aslam v Public Prosecutor
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Kan Ting Chiu J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: David Rasif (David Rasif and Partners) and Goh Teck Wee (Goh Chang JP and Wong) for appellant; Khoo Oon Soo and Terrence Tay (Deputy Public Prosecutors) for respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Offences/Murder/Whether deceased's husband or appellant had committed offence/Whether weight could be attributed to fact that deceased's husband initially charged for murder/Whether weight attributed to fact that deceased's husband's DNA found in stain on deceased's kitchen floor/Whether appellant had made false confessions.
